name: Cybele:Guardian
description:
Fire, Wind or Earth? Choose your favorite element to gain different abilities, defeat the minions of the Fiendish Forces, and fight for your life against their terrifying leaders. Follow Cybele in her path to save her home whilst choosing different abilities along the way in this hectical 2D platformer.

Cybele:Guardian was made during the course of one month in one of my courses at YRGO, Gothenburg where I am studying to become a Game Developer! The game is mostly just a prototype at this point as the only abilities available are Fire.  Wind and Earth have the required functionality but no graphics for them.
